name: CUBERUN (itch) (hotiovip)
description:
FOR NOW is just a TEST, but as soon as possible it will become a better game. I will add pickupables, power-ups and so many things. THAT´S JUST A TEST VERSION WITH SOME LEVELS AND SOME SCREENS. IF YOU LIKE THE IDEA AND WANT TO SEE THE FULL GAME PUBLISHED SEND AN EMAIL TO: hotiovipita@gmail.com WITH THIS TITLE:  CUBERUN.

Thanks for your time :)
